content.description:
Rapiebant me spectacula theatri, plena imaginibus
dolorum meorum et fomitibusfomes, fomitis, m.: fuel ignis mei.
content.question: According to the sentence, which of the following effects does the theater have on the author?

choices.label: It provokes thoughts of personal grief.
It makes him satisfied with his life.
It distracts him from his worries.

content.answer: It provokes thoughts of personal grief.
